subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ryan Palmer took only 21 putts and made birdie on half of his holes to post an eight-under-par 63 and take a two-shot lead through the opening round of the Deutsche Bank Championship in Norton, Mass.
snippet: Ryan Palmer took only 21 putts and made birdie on half of his holes to post an eight-under-par 63 and take a two-shot lead through the opening round of the Deutsche Bank Championship in Norton, Mass.
